item.title: CS3012 - Software Engineering
item.description:
This is the landing page for the CS 3012 course on Software Engineering.

Here you can find announcements regarding the course, and other miscellaneous information.

Announcements

  • The module repository is now live and all students must request access to be able to submit assignments
